attributes.action: Theresa May to invoke article 50 1st December 2016
attributes.additional_details: NO single market no more immigration & no going behind our backs enough is enough article 50 1st December 2016
attributes.background: We the over 17 million people who voted a legit vote to leave the EU demand Theresa may to invoke article 50 1st dec 2016.After investigation we know there is no need to wait any longer! the people have spoken and we demand this to be done.
